title: Looking for good top and mid laner for OOL Tournament Bronze+
body: We are looking for good top and mid laners that will be able to play for the OOL tournament on the weekend 2 weeks from now, the elo required to join the team is bronze or silver, maybe higher if u want to join us bronzies, Please text me on league, my summoner name is JT BBE, i will reply as soon as i can, and please if u do wanna join, add me on league as soon as possible cause we need to begin our training soon ^^, thank you.
